title: Buy account !!!!
body:
i want buy acc level 30 . Have 16 champ. 
i have it . call me 0451106930 or rep in here

replies.body: Buying and selling acc isn't allowed.

> [{quoted}](name=Best AD VietNam,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ln87RWAu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-22T03:49:13.618+0000)
>
> why

You don't own them, so you can't sell them.

Riot simply lets you borrow the accounts, for free too, while you have control over it to play games with but you don't have the ownership of it.

You sign the contract yourself when you join the League of Legends, it's the rule here.
